solutions.title: Open all fire hydrants
solutions.description: Until the firefighters closed them, the fire should be gone.

solutions.title: Let it rain
solutions.description: And make some sour apple belts out of the acid in there

solutions.title: Play with some helicopters and air planes and water it
solutions.description: Love this toys they built all for me.

solutions.title: Get rid of all oxygen in the air
solutions.description: Only for a few seconds and hope the hummingbirds also survive it.

title: Virus is spreading in @
description: If they were aware that on every body there are more entities than humans on this blue marble …

solutions.title: Silently vaccinate everyone
solutions.description: Be careful that not one single child gets autism during this time.

solutions.title: Give free face masks for everyone
solutions.description: Hope they do not hoard them - because you never know when you may need them again.

title: There is an an earthquake near @

solutions.title: Strengthen local buildings
solutions.description: With Jet-Fuel safe steel.

solutions.title: Seal some plates
solutions.description: What about their simulation models about the future?

solutions.title: Give everyone free holidays
solutions.description: Hope they take the airplane and fly immediately far, far away.

title: @ is struck by a thunderstorm
description: I spend a lot of time wachting the humans while they try to photograph a thunder.

solutions.title: Build lightning rods
solutions.description: I have a moral dilemma. Should I put them on churches or not?

solutions.title: Give umbrellas to everyone, with metal handles
solutions.description: Cheaper version of lightning rods. Unfortunate collateral damage.

solutions.title: Let the sun shine a few god rays through the clouds
solutions.description: Which hopefully convince people to go into the church. And maybe pray for you -  a little bit.

title: Airplane crashes in @
description: Pilot fell asleep and the junior officer doesn't know what all the buttons are for. Emergency descent definitively wasn't the right one.

solutions.title: Hack the friend/foe identification
solutions.description: The military should care about it.

solutions.title: Divert the flight path with strong head winds
solutions.description: Just turn off the wind generators first.

solutions.title: Call the air force to escort it
solutions.description: Take one of this red phones.

title: @ is invaded by aliens
description: They mentioned that they predicted that humans will obliterate them. Sounds legit.

solutions.title: Build self-targeting laser arrays
solutions.description: Put some reasonable rules inside the AI. Don't like to repeat this Terminator mistake again.

solutions.title: Give them human like appearance
solutions.description: Nobody will notice

solutions.title: Call this man in black
solutions.description: Wonder if he also can do his job in red

solutions.title: Convince them, humans are on the good side
solutions.description: I've no idea how. Need to raise my communication skill first

title: @ has too many malnourished children
description: Why didn't they stay at this wonderful places where there is enough water and fruits for everyone?

solutions.title: Bushes and trees immediately grow some fruits
solutions.description: You gave them farkleberries and have no idea why they don't love you.

solutions.title: Send around e-mails, how to get some money for free
solutions.description: Think about something different then the Nigerian Prince this time.

solutions.title: Give them another strain of genetically modifiered rice
solutions.description: This pesky humans still seem to prefer the long game and breed in ungodly ways, but you don't have time for that.

solutions.title: Free education for all parents
solutions.description: Hmm just realized it already exists on the internet, but they do not use it. What Khan I do about it?

title: @ is flooded
description: They were just invented to water all this plants out in the nowhere. But humans could not resist and had to build every major city close to rivers and oceans.

solutions.title: Move around some earth
solutions.description: Through Earthquake? Divert magma streams? Let ants build some tunnels?

solutions.title: Provide millions of sandbags
solutions.description: Be careful that nobody steals it and makes even more concrete out of it

title: Radiation is in @
description: Cheap method to keep humans out of the area. Allow the nature to grow freely.

solutions.title: Provide anti-radiation drugs
solutions.description: No don't mix it with something else. This is not a sociale experiment.

solutions.title: Provide lead armor for everyone
solutions.description: And maybe strenghten all their bones a little bit. Need to prepare them for other planets anyway.

solutions.title: Ring the bunker bells
solutions.description: Will they survive without the ability to use their smartphone down there?

title: Bees are extinct @
description: How invented the idea that boring green lawns in front of every house are amazing? I spent centuries to give all this flowers beautiful colors.

solutions.title: Make flowers even stronger
solutions.description: Last year you gave them ability to grow through streets, but seems this was not enough.

solutions.title: Extinct varoa
solutions.description: At least the bee keepers will pray to you.

solutions.title: Let it be
solutions.description: And build submarines so everyone can hide in the oceans.

title: People panic in @
description: I only wanted them to fear heights, before they jump, and not afterwards.

solutions.title: Provide psychological first aid
solutions.description: Maybe do it through a YouTube hit. But how to get the clicks?

solutions.title: Put some big stones everywhere
solutions.description: At least they do not run over each other.

solutions.title: Try to convince them hey have free will
solutions.description: And tell them even if it doesn't exist, they still should believe it. Try to sound clever about this.

solutions.title: Let the police do their duty
solutions.description: … although not sure if this is still a good idea this year

title: Ivy is getting the upperhand in @
description: I thought they see how useful it may be. But I already failed with hemp. Should have known it.

solutions.title: Get some herbicides
solutions.description: The natural ones. Whatever the word natural means.

solutions.title: Plant some thing else which kills Ivy
solutions.description: And hope this does not get out of control either.

title: Climate is getting out of control in @
description: Sometimes I ask myself if it is not easier to just wait and let the problem solve itself.

solutions.title: Ask children
solutions.description: They seem to be more interested in this …

solutions.title: Evaporate all fossil fuel
solutions.description: You tought it is just to give them an easier start.

solutions.title: Suck the CO2 out of the atmosphere
solutions.description: Make an infinite soda refill station out of it. Open question: Do they fart out the CO2?

title: Everyone is surveilled in @
description: They fear each other more than they should fear me.

solutions.title: Pay the education fee for everyone
solutions.description: Didn't I do that already because of almost every other problem?

solutions.title: Make a James Bond movie about it
solutions.description: And hope someone notices the reference

solutions.title: Make another App-Store
solutions.description: … with user centric guidelines. Any maybe do not change the TOS whenever you feel about it.

solutions.title: Extradite Snowden.
solutions.description: But where to put him? Gets harder everyday :(

title: War is in @
description: Ok crocodiles were not scarry enough. Lions also not. Hippos, check, but we don't have enough. But that they had to invent something so scarry themself.

solutions.title: Let the ones fight the war, who make the decisions
solutions.description: Shortest war ever

solutions.title: Send everyone an SMS
solutions.description: With the question: Are you just going because someone told you?

solutions.title: Draw new borders
solutions.description: They seem to have a knack for very straight lines.

solutions.title: Give the other side free candy
solutions.description: Only blue M&Ms.

title: @ is overpopulated
description: With what? Humans or the farting animals they all want to eat?

solutions.title: Make birth control available for everyone
solutions.description: This time for men.

solutions.title: Invent retirement pension
solutions.description: Will children still care about their parents or just let them rot?

solutions.title: Make education better
solutions.description: How amazing if they start to understand and stop to fear.

title: Electricity black out in @
description: Will they every be able to find this grand unified theory? And yes, we sometimes play the dice.

solutions.title: Build another power plant
solutions.description: They're not ready for fusion. Lead them on the wrong path for another 30 years.

solutions.title: Turn off the air conditioning
solutions.description: They will complain, but they have no idea how hot it is to make a sun.

solutions.title: Build a super capacitor
solutions.description: Out of unobtanium.

title: @ is struck by a gamma burst ray
description: Not even Forrest could outrun it.
